title: China students hold principal hostage in protest
description: The protests were over plans to merge colleges with "less prestigious" vocational institutes.

title: US Senate passes sweeping bill to counter China
description: The historic $250bn bill saw divided parties unite to compete with China's technological ambitions.

title: Nicaragua arrests two more opposition figures
description: Four potential challengers to President Daniel Ortega in November's election have now been arrested.

title: South Korean mayor 'sorry' for vaccine fraud case
description: He apologised after believing a foreign company would provide 30 million doses of the Pfizer vaccine.

title: ‘Unbelievable’ whale super-group caught on camera
description: A massive whale pod has been seen "bubble-net" feeding for the first time off Australia’s coast.
